meanings.definition: The underside of a shoe that is worn down from use.
meanings.sent1: I could see the worn turnsoles of his sneakers as he walked by.
meanings.sent2: The turnsoles of her boots were smooth from all the walking.
meanings.sent3: The little dog tried to chew on the turnsoles of my slippers!
meanings.sent4: After years of hiking, his turnsoles resembled the surface of a river stone.
meanings.sent5: The cobbler examined the turnsoles carefully before repairing them.
